participant_1.background:
My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida.
I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination.
i am a childrens librarian.
I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia.
but , i feel lost and far away from who i truly am.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
I'm going to re-read Anne of Green Gables, but I won't be sharing it with my mom.
i live in the city of grand rapids , michigan.
i hope to be a football player when i grow up.

content.text: I hope you're having a great day! I recently started a cupcake business and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! I love baking, I've been thinking about starting a baking business myself.
That would be so cool! I'm actually a children's librarian, but I've always loved baking.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a librarian. I love reading and I love helping people.
Me too! It's so much fun to help kids find books they'll love.
I recently moved to Grand Rapids, Michigan. It's a beautiful city!
I've heard great things about Grand Rapids! I'm from Florida, but I've always wanted to visit Michigan.
You should definitely come visit! We have a lot of great things to do here.
I will! Maybe I'll come visit your baking business when I'm in town.
That would be awesome! I'd love to show you around.
